sentences.sContent: The court can impose a fine.
sentences.sCn: 法庭可以强制执行罚款。

sentences.sContent: ...many federal and state laws impose post-conviction restrictions on a shockingly large number of Americans...
...It would be a very good beginning to impose an additional tax on...
...you lose control over your life and give others the power to impose punishment that you have no control over...

remMethod.val: im(使…) ＋ pos(放) ＋ e → 强行放置 → 把…强加于

words.tran: （建筑物等）壮观的；威风的；（仪表）堂堂的；给人深刻印象的
征收；强加；欺骗；不公平的负担
欺骗（impose的过去分词）；把…强加于

trans.tranOther: if someone in authority imposes a rule, punishment, tax etc, they force people to accept it
